# MyApp

Intro paragraph for MyApp that is long enough to force chunking in tests.
This paragraph is meant to be stable and predictable across runs.

## Overview
The overview section describes the problem domain and expected behavior.
It includes a few sentences so we can verify chunk boundaries.

## Auth
Token refresh uses rotating refresh tokens stored in memory for tests.
Additional details describe login flows and access checks.

## API
- GET /health
- POST /sessions
- DELETE /sessions/:id
